Robert " Bobby " Trench ( Denzel Washington ) and Michael " Stig " Stigman ( Mark Wahlberg ) working together for ten months and try to do business with Papi Greco ( Edward James Olmos ) , a powerful Mexican drug trafficker who operates in the United States . As Papi is wary of the duo, refuses to negotiate with them . The output is then robbing a bank that supposedly receive revenue left every week for the dealer 's henchmen . However , the amount available in the vault is much bigger than Bobby and Stig imagined , which makes it clear that there are more people involved in the situation . What neither of them imagined was that the partner was an undercover agent with the goal of disrupting Papi Greco : while Bobby was of Narcotics , Stig was part of the intelligence sector Navy .
